5: <sup>5</sup> The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
6: <sup>6</sup> And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
7: <sup>7</sup> And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
8: <sup>8</sup> The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
9: <sup>9</sup> And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
10: <sup>10</sup> And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
11: <sup>11</sup> And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
12: <sup>12</sup> And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
13: <sup>13</sup> And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
14: <sup>14</sup> The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
15: <sup>15</sup> And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
16: <sup>16</sup> And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
17: <sup>17</sup> The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
18: <sup>18</sup> And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
19: <sup>19</sup> And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother’s name was Joktan.
20: <sup>20</sup> And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
21: <sup>21</sup> Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
22: <sup>22</sup> And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
23: <sup>23</sup> And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
28: <sup>28</sup> The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
29: <sup>29</sup> These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
30: <sup>30</sup> Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
31: <sup>31</sup> Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
32: <sup>32</sup> Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
33: <sup>33</sup> And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
34: <sup>34</sup> And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
35: <sup>35</sup> The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
36: <sup>36</sup> The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
37: <sup>37</sup> The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
38: <sup>38</sup> And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezar, and Dishan.
39: <sup>39</sup> And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan’s sister.
40: <sup>40</sup> The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. and the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
41: <sup>41</sup> The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
42: <sup>42</sup> The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
43: <sup>43</sup> Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
44: <sup>44</sup> And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
45: <sup>45</sup> And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
46: <sup>46</sup> And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
47: <sup>47</sup> And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
48: <sup>48</sup> And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
49: <sup>49</sup> And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
50: <sup>50</sup> And when Baalhanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
51: <sup>51</sup> Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
52: <sup>52</sup> Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
53: <sup>53</sup> Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
54: <sup>54</sup> Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
